alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Lakeshore Flood Watch issued December 25 at 2:42PM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...LAKESHORE FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Lakeshore flooding possible. * WHERE...Canal Park to Bayfront Festival Park and areas in between within the city of Duluth. * WHEN...From late tonight through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Large waves of 10 to 15 feet and prolonged gale force wind gusts out of the northeast will result in piling up of water in the Twin Ports area which may increase water levels to around 603 ft at the Duluth water level station and result in coastal flooding. Portions of Canal Park, Harbor Drive behind the DECC and Helberg Drive may become flooded.
info.instruction: Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
